# [Interview #809: A Feast of Fantasy Interview, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=809#9)

#### Sabrina Fish

#### RANDOM QUESTIONS

If you could play Magic:The Gathering with one person, dead or alive, who would it be and why?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Thatâ€™s an easy one. Richard Garfield, who created and designed Magic. I want him to sign some of my cards.
